events.name: Singapore PHP Meetup (June 2015)
events.description: Venue: PayPal Singapore @ Suntec City Tower 5 Address: 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01, Suntec Tower Five,[masked] ​Time: 7:30pm ** Do bring along a photo ID ** Topic: 1) Laravel in Practice Speaker: Gibson Tang​ 2) Tripping around HHVM Blunders and practical lessons on implementing HHVM in production. (He said something about being humbled by it.) Speaker: Robert Sim​ 3) Why use Symfony 2? Speaker: Laurent Ghirardotti -------------------------------------- Lightning Talks: Application Performance Management for PHP Understand how you can use APM to throughout the lifecycle of your PHP application (development, UAT, operation, new releases) Speaker: Eric Tan, AppDynamics *** Call for lightning talks *** Do message me or email me at [masked]. (Subject: "I want to speak!") Venue / Food Sponsor: PayPal Singapore
events.location: PayPal Singapore, 5 Temasek Boulevard, Level 9, Suntec Tower 5, Singapore 038985
events.group_name: The Singapore PHP User Group Meetup
